#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,sum;
    long c;
    cin>>t;

    while(t)
    {
        cin>>n>>c;
        sum=0;
        int *a = new int[n];

        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            sum = sum + a[i];
        }

        if(sum > c)
            cout<<"No\n";
        else
            cout<<"Yes\n";

        delete []a;
        t--;
    }


    return 0;
}
